mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.user_id, m.user_name, to_char(c.created_at,'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as created_at, CASE WHEN #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NOT NULL AND c.user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS author FROM com_comment c LEFT JOIN Member m ON c.user_id = m.user_id WHERE post_id = #{post_id} ORDER BY comment_id DESC
mapper.insert:
select COM_COMMENT_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into com_comment(comment_id, post_id, content, created_at, user_id) values(#{comment_id},#{post_id},#{content}, sysdate ,#{user_id})
mapper.delete: delete from com_comment where comment_id = #{comment_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
